tns:patch.author: eperez
tns:patch.description: Add missing categories values as soft deleted entries

script.lang:
INSERT INTO amp_category_value(id, category_value, amp_category_class_id, index_column,deleted) select nextval('amp_category_value_seq'),'Planned',(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type'), (select (max (index_column)+ 1) from amp_category_value where amp_category_class_id=(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type')),true WHERE NOT EXISTS (select 1 from amp_category_value where category_value='Planned' and amp_category_class_id=(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type'));
INSERT INTO amp_category_value(id, category_value, amp_category_class_id, index_column,deleted) select nextval('amp_category_value_seq'),'Actual',(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type'), (select (max (index_column)+ 1) from amp_category_value where amp_category_class_id=(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type')),true WHERE NOT EXISTS (select 1 from amp_category_value where category_value='Actual' and amp_category_class_id=(select id from AMP_CATEGORY_CLASS where keyname='adjustment_type'));
